property.name: status
property.description: Valid values are [ Active, Canceled, Expired, Not Started, Withdrawn ]

property.name: billingCycle
property.description: Valid values are [ calendar-monthly, calendar-quarterly, calendar-half-yearly, calendar-yearly, anniversary-monthly, anniversary-quarterly, anniversary-half-yearly, anniversary-yearly ]

property.name: numberOfCyclesBilledTogether
property.description: Number of billing cycles that are billed together in one bill. This only applies for recurring charges. Usage charges are billed per single billing cycle. minimum: 1, maximum: 99

property.name: requestedCancellationDate
property.description: The requested cancellation date of a subscription, format YYYY-MM-DD.

property.name: requestedCancellationDate
property.description: The requested cancellation date of a subscription, format YYYY-MM-DD.

property.name: type
property.description: classification of the error type, lower case with underscore eg validation_failure

property.name: paymentMethod
property.description: Possible values are [ Payment Card, Invoice, External Card ]

property.name: subscriptionType
property.description: Valid Values are [ Test, Trial/Beta, Internal Billing, Commercial ]

property.name: method
property.description: `AUTO` if the bill will be closed on the predetermined billing date.`MANUAL` if the bill will stay open until closed manually.")

property.name: type
property.description: The type text of the card. Sample values are [ DPAM, DPDS, DPVI, DPMC, DPDI, DPJC ]")

property.name: typeText
property.description: The type text of the card. Sample values are [ AMERICAN EXPRESS, DISCOVER, VISA, MasterCard, Diners Club, JCB ]")

property.name: status
property.description: original HTTP error code, should be consistent with the response HTTP code")

property.name: status
property.description: original HTTP error code, should be consistent with the response HTTP code")

property.name: method
property.description: The payment method. Valid values are [ Invoice, Payment Card, External Card ]

property.name: paymentStatus
property.description: The payment method. Valid values are [ UNKNOWN, NOT_SETTLED, SUCCESS, FAILED, ERROR ]

property.name: reversal
property.description: Indicator that determines whether this credit reverses a previous credit

property.name: reversal
property.description: Indicator that determines whether this credit reverses a previous credit

property.name: unit
property.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (2-3 characters); if no unit is given, it is assumed to be the code 'C62', which stands for 'pieces' ('1' in math/physics terms, or also 'each')

property.name: currency
property.description: ISO 4217 currency code, for example USD, EUR, CHF

property.name: priceType
property.description: Valid values are [Net, Gross]

property.name: type
property.description: Valid values are [ INDIVIDUAL, CORPORATE ]

property.name: currency
property.description: ISO 4217 currency code, for example USD, EUR, CHF

property.name: status
property.description: Valid values are [ SUCCESS, FAILED ]
